div.p: Merry XMas and happy New Year to you all yours of the 18th, recd yesteday the Box has not come but I suppose it will be here tomorrow many thanks for the contents which are just what I want, and which I will use daily, setting by the fire at night My commission has not come and I have written Mr Cutts to try and get it with the assistance of I red gehorton the agent StLouis has resigned and if I get the appointment I shall probably be ordered there which will be very conveneint Genl Arme says that he does not wish to press the matter. that my name is before the Secretary and

he does not think he ought to write again but I think that Mr. cutts may be able to do all that is wanting I fear that Hattie is improvident in nurturing on the Icu as a fall night injure her back I am glad to be am that she does not suffer as much as she did before she left school I am not able to do what she wanted me to do money is too scares and busines uncertain. she wanted to make you a present and it would have rejoiced me to enable her to do it, you will have to take the will for the deed. I hope that Charlotte was able to take her part in the examination as I know she will do herself credit I am to dine today with Mr. Buna and Mr. Yeatman is also going he will walk out with me I do not feel very merry thinking

so much of my dear ones at home. Monday Dec 26. Mr. Yeatman came in for me when I had written this much and we walked out to Mr. Buna through a light rain which had been falling all day we had a good dinner and a cup of coffee which suited me well and a pleasant time the weather all day very disagreable tho not cold to day the sun is out and weather pleasant streets very muddy.

When you pay the rent deduct the amt paid for the cellar windows #13.50 - I do not know where the receipt is but Randolph the carpenter will give you another if it is necessary. I do want to see you so mcuh that I can scarcely contain myself and this season particularly makes me think more of you than usual Love & kisses to all Your aff Husband
